name: The Cliff
description: The Cliff is a Point&Click Adventure game/experience inspired by a short story Stanisław Lem called "Seventh Voyage" in which a spaceship defect forces Tichy through a series of time vortices, creating a multitude of temporal copies of himself and also the movie "The Moon" in which an astronaut encounters with his clone in a mining facility on the Moon. The Cliff's main purpose is creating similar environement and experience for player. What would you do, if you encounter with yourselves? Would you sacrifice them, eleminate them to be the only one or maybe salvation requires unity?
